Dead by Daylight is a great horror game. It's very fun to play and consists of four survivors trying to escape from one killer. You can choose between different survivors and perks to go with them as well as different killers with perks to go with them too. No level is the same since every time you play the maps are randomized meaning even when you're on the same map it will be set up different each time. This game is great, I haven't had any trouble with it since I've had it. If you have played Friday the 13th: The Game and liked it then you'll love this one.

While there are some occurring issues here and there, I can't deny how fun this game has been. It's become a go-to of mine, and it's honestly a bit addicting. I do wish cross-progression was implemented; I started playing DBD back in 2019 on console, and I made the switch to PC this past year, and unfortunately had to start back at 0. With all that said, it's still a great game, and it's introduced me to so many wonderful people. Having come out years ago, the updates are still fresh and new and always add to the gme in some way.

Sidenote: I disagree with all alleged partnerships/involvement with NFTs. It's completely unethical, and I genuinely hope the devs didn't / wouldn't take part in it.
